title: Samsung Galaxy A53 lands in India, pricing and availability revealed
content:
Following months of leaks and rumors, Samsung finally launched the Galaxy A53 alongside the Galaxy A33 in the US last week. And now the phone is making its way to the Indian market. Galaxy A53 Indian pricing & availability The Galaxy A53 phone starts at â‚¹34,449 for the base variant with 6GB RAM and 128GB

The post Samsung Galaxy A53 lands in India, pricing and availability revealed appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Galaxy A53 has launched in India. It will be available for preorder starting March 21, with sales kicking off from March 25.
